tool_description: This Read-Only API Allows Users To Access Their Sleeper Fantasy Football Leagues. Lookup Leagues, Check Standings, View Keeper Options And More.
name: Satellite API
title: Satellite API

api_list.name: LOOKUP
api_list.description: Lookup active Sleeper leagues for a given username.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://satellite-api.p.rapidapi.com/lookup/2ksports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "satellite-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://satellite-api.p.rapidapi.com/lookup/{username}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "satellite-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
